SEARCH
Package org.lwjgl.cuda

Class CUmemPoolPtrExportData

java.lang.Object
org.lwjgl.system.Pointer.Default
org.lwjgl.system.Struct
org.lwjgl.cuda.CUmemPoolPtrExportData
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable, NativeResource, Pointer
public class CUmemPoolPtrExportData extends Struct implements NativeResource
Opaque data for exporting a pool allocation.

Layout


 struct CUmemPoolPtrExportData {
     unsigned char reserved[64];
 }

  • Constructor Details

    • CUmemPoolPtrExportData

      public CUmemPoolPtrExportData(ByteBuffer container)
      Creates a CUmemPoolPtrExportData instance at the current position of the specified ByteBuffer container. Changes to the buffer's content will be visible to the struct instance and vice versa.

      The created instance holds a strong reference to the container object.
